// UserModel.ts
/**
 * A class representing a user profile with an ID, name, and game scores.
 */export class UserModel{/**
	 * Creates an instance of UserProfile.
	 * @param id The user ID.
	 * @param name The user name.
	 * @param scores Optional initial scores for games.
	 */constructor(id,name){let scores=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:{};this.id=void 0;this.name=void 0;// Mapping of game names to scores
this.scores=void 0;this.id=id;this.name=name;this.scores=scores;}/**
	 * Gets the user's name.
	 * @returns The user's name.
	 */getName(){return this.name;}/**
	 * Sets the user's name.
	 * @param name The new name to set.
	 */setName(name){this.name=name;}/**
	 * Gets the user's ID.
	 * @returns The user's ID.
	 */getID(){return this.id;}/**
	 * Sets the user's ID.
	 * @param id The new ID to set.
	 */setID(id){this.id=id;}/**
	 * Gets the user's scores for all games.
	 * @returns The scores mapping for all games.
	 */getScores(){return this.scores;}/**
	 * Gets the user's score for a specific game.
	 * @param gameName The name of the game.
	 * @returns The score for the specified game.
	 */getScoreFor(gameName){return this.scores[gameName];}/**
	 * Sets the user's scores for all games.
	 * @param scores The new scores mapping for all games.
	 */setScores(scores){this.scores=scores;}/**
	 * Sets the user's ID in a browser cookie.
	 */setUserIdInCookie(){document.cookie="userId=".concat(this.id,"; SameSite=Strict; Secure; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT");}}
